trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Westport
There were no other sightings in Westport on or around January 1st 2013
divs: sighting detailstook dog out at 12:40 am in back yard on a starless night. looked up to see large orange\yellow glowing blimp like craft flying under cloud cover. thought it was commercial jet at first but was about 10 times brighter than jet's navigation lights and did not flash strobes like jets at night. as soon as i sighted light thought it was extremely odd, not appearing like any normal craft,jets,helicopters etc and when i realized it was totally silent i was perplexed. it traveled a little faster than corporate jets that fly by house for bridgeport ct .airport it was fairly low in sky passing behind trees and eventually lost sight in north east sky i thought it was far to bright to be any navigation lights it looked about the size of a blimp. but made no noise and traveled straight ,but with a dancing type trajectory. never saw anything that closely resembled object in 60 years of seeing aircraft etc. at night
Summary: about blimp size moving faster than commercial jet,under cloud cover,no noise
